Naseeruddin Shah Hits Back At Pak PM Imran Khan, Tells Him To Take Care Of His Own Country
Naseeruddin Shah Hits Back At Pak PM Imran Khan, Tells Him To Take Care Of His Own Country
Actor Naseeruddin Shah once again had made headlines facing the heat on his remarks on mob lynching and religion in the country. During an interview he expressed his worry for his children in today’s India and became the eye of the storm. He is facing a lot of trolls on social media, being called a traitor, and is receiving threats being asked to leave the country.
Also Read: After His Controversial Remarks, Naseeruddin Shah Gets Threats, Richa Chadha Extends Support
From Baba Ramdev and Anupam Kher to Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan, Naseeruddin Shah has received a lot of flak from his peers, political leaders and public.
Amid the controversial remark by Naseeruddin Shah, Pak PM Imran Khan had recently said that he will show Narendra Modi and his government “how to treat minorities.”
“I read what Naseeruddin Shah had to say about the current situation of India, what he is saying now, Jinnah said the same all those years ago,” Khan added.
Hitting back at Imran Khan, Naseeruddin Shah advised him to take care of his own country as we know how to look at ourselves.

“I think Mr Khan should be walking the talk in his own country instead of commenting on issues that don’t concern him. We have been a democracy for 70 years and we know how to look after ourselves,” he told newspaper Sunday Express.
